attr.title: Mobility
attr.desc: Mobility is an acrobatic precision platformer. Play as a spaceship mechanic in training, while climbing the ranks of the Mobility - a legendary union of repairsman, known all across the galaxy.
attr.desc_md:
Mobility is an acrobatic precision platformer. Play as a spaceship mechanic in training, while climbing the ranks of the Mobility - a legendary union of repairsman, known all across the galaxy.

In Mobility, every platform is a switch you activate upon contact. The goal in each level is to activate all platforms, making each level a little puzzle, especially when you're attempting to score a new record.
attr.inst: Download mobility-windows.zip from https://auroriax.itch.io/mobility. Unzip the contents to /ports/mobility/gamedata
attr.inst_md: Download mobility-windows.zip from [itch.io](https://auroriax.itch.io/mobility). Unzip the contents to /ports/mobility/gamedata
